narrative:
This was a prelicense inspection for a Class (cid:28)"C(cid:29)" Exhibitor license.  
There were no animals on the premise at this time. This is a seasonal exhibit that will maintain 2 reindeer for the
Christmas season. 
Facility meets all standards and regulations at this time.
An application fee will be submitted to the Regional Office (920 Main Campus Dr, Suite 200, Raleigh, NC 27606). 
No regulated activities can be conducted until a license is obtained. 
An exit briefing was conducted with the applicant.
